trans-unit.source: Specifies a destination <see cref="T:System.Type" /> in another assembly.
trans-unit.target: Especifica um <see cref="T:System.Type" /> de destino em outro assembly.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.TypeForwardedToAttribute> attribute to move a type from one assembly to another without disrupting callers that compiled against the old assembly.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.TypeForwardedToAttribute> atributo para mover um tipo de um assembly para outro sem interromper os chamadores compilado em relação ao assembly antigo.

trans-unit.source: **Note** [!INCLUDE[vbprvbext](~/includes/vbprvbext-md.md)] does not support the use of the <xref:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.TypeForwardedToAttribute> attribute to forward types written in [!INCLUDE[vbprvblong](~/includes/vbprvblong-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: **Observação** [!INCLUDE[vbprvbext](~/includes/vbprvbext-md.md)] não suporta o uso do <xref:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.TypeForwardedToAttribute> escrito em tipos de atributo para encaminhar [!INCLUDE[vbprvblong](~/includes/vbprvblong-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: Applications written in [!INCLUDE[vbprvblong](~/includes/vbprvblong-md.md)] can use forwarded types written in other languages.
trans-unit.target: Aplicativos escritos em [!INCLUDE[vbprvblong](~/includes/vbprvblong-md.md)] pode usar tipos encaminhados escritos em outras linguagens.

trans-unit.source: The destination <see cref="T:System.Type" /> in another assembly.
trans-unit.target: O destino <see cref="T:System.Type" /> em outro assembly.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.TypeForwardedToAttribute" /> class specifying a destination <see cref="T:System.Type" />.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.TypeForwardedToAttribute" />, especificando um destino <see cref="T:System.Type" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the destination <see cref="T:System.Type" /> in another assembly.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o destino <see cref="T:System.Type" /> em outro assembly.

trans-unit.source: The destination <see cref="T:System.Type" /> in another assembly.
trans-unit.target: O destino <see cref="T:System.Type" /> em outro assembly.
